item.title: About Me
item.description: I'm a Software Engineer I love to crochet, game, travel and sometimes take pictures. In the past few years I've traveled to, in alphabetical order: Canada, Iceland, Mexico, Spain, Sweden, the UK and hopefully many more to come. If you go to my photography section right now you can find pictures from 2018 and onward. Feel free to reach out!
